Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory16.jpg'}
{3: 'The research laboratory is as deserted as ever, save for the cold, uncaring glow of a small display, where digits skip and change in the corner of the room.'}
{3: 'In front of the display is Asimov, his head in his arms on the table. Next to him is a cup of cold coffee and a sandwich untouched for way too long.'}
{3: '"New Year" is approaching, according to the traditional lunar calendar.'}
{3: "The room would have been fittingly lonely if not for Asimov's slow, heavy breaths."}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Asimov, sir... Please wake up.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'What did I... Huh, I fell asleep.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: "Sorry to disturb your rest. I'm here to deliver Gray Raven's data on our session in the battle simulation.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'The four of you stare as Asimov gulps down his cold coffee with furrowed brows, and he does not look at you until he has settled himself.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: '...How many times have you run the sim? Have you gotten the hang of the "Combat Unit Booster", or are you still...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "47 times. We've more or less grasped how to make use of this mechanoid.", 4: '1'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "Overall speaking, there doesn't seem to be any issues, functionality-wise. But given the differences between our frames, you should probably focus on the battle data of Lucia and me.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Although... "Combat Unit Booster" is quite a mouthful, isn\'t it?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Just call it a CUB.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Liv', 3: '...CUB? That does seem pretty fitting, and it sounds... it sounds cute...', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I've been asleep for...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov takes a look at the digits on the display.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: '75 minutes. Based on your past data and my projections, you should have been able to complete 4 to 5 runs during this timespan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "I hope you didn't slow down just to give me a more diverse set of data. You know how deeply I care about your test results.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: "Don't worry, Asimov. Commandant has also participated in the simulation...", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I didn't realize you're here as well, 【kuroname】... and I don't remember asking for your involvement if I'm being honest.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov turns his chair toward you, his fingers crossed under his chin.'}
{2: "My team's mission is my mission.", 3: '37', 4: 'Whoa, the bags under your eyes have gotten worse!', 5: '38'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Save it.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Mind your own business!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Forget it. Now that you're here, I'll save myself the legwork and explain the project to you altogether.", 4: '1'}
{3: "He sighs, trying to figure out how to phrase his explanation in layman's terms."}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "First, just to clarify, I wasn't stealing your team behind your back... It's just that the drones we're developing this time are not your conventional mechanoids.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "They can connect to the M.I.N.D. and behave according to a Construct's thoughts.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But they\'re not controlled by the Constructs. They function with their own AI systems—they\'re designed to be combat "partners" of a Construct squad.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '..."Partners"? Aren\'t they just armed drones?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "Compared to their combat capability, we wanted to focus more on CUBs' abilities to stabilize the M.I.N.D., which is why we designed them in the form of animal companions.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: 'Would that actually work...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Liv', 3: 'Theoretically, it would. Pets are human companions, after all! With them by our side, we would naturally feel calmer...', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lee', 3: 'Are they "pets," though? They look more like the monsters in the ancient texts found in Kowloong.', 4: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "We commissioned Leonie from the WGAA to design their appearances, so their looks are heavily influenced by her artistic sensibilities. If you have complaints, she's the one you're looking for.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "It's fine. I'm not that obsessed with appearances...", 4: '2'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Anyway, these CUBs are created to help Constructs maintain their human cognitions—a sense of security, belonging, protective instincts... These can all stabilize your M.I.N.D.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Sounds like the role of a commandant.', 3: '61'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "True, but not every squad comes with a commandant as reliable as you are, do they? Given how much it takes to develop a commandant and the rate we're losing them... We have to find a suitable alternative.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: "And that is why the data with a commandant's involvement would be inaccurate.", 4: '1'}
{2: "That's why you didn't ask me to participate in the simulations.", 3: '64'}

{2: 'Lee', 3: "If you're hoping to test a team-support model, you'd need to make sure it's compatible with different types of Constructs. You can't do that only with simulations on Babylonia.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Therefore, I\'ve also requested other... "tests." Speaking of which, it should be time—', 4: '1'}

{3: 'An animated firework pops up on Asimov\'s comms interface with the word "Happy New Year!", seemingly anticipating his responses. But Asimov simply ignores it and enters the comms channel straight away.'}
{2: 'System', 3: 'Incoming transmission—'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: 'Sorry for the interruption—', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I have a bad feeling about this...', 3: '74', 4: 'Are you working overtime?', 5: '74'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: 'Sorry to interrupt your conversation, but Asimov asked, so here I am after proper working hours.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Celica', 3: "I assume our heartless researcher hasn't even raised a brow when I criticized him in his face, has he?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "I'll say it again—I personally do not believe that holidays should be allowed in the field of scientific research.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Celica', 3: "Of course—I'm sorry we have to ask Gray Raven to crunch again. And Asimov, I know you meant it, but I'm still hoping that you'll pay attention to your work-life balance.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '2'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Is it my turn, Celica? Hello, Gray Raven, thank you for your work.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Based on what we discussed with Asimov earlier and his applications, 【kuroname】, we have to ask you to leave on your own.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Nothing! We literally need you to leave for a one-person journey.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Simply put—Asimov, maybe you should do the briefing instead. It's your request, after all. You'll probably explain the mission details better.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '2'}

{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: 'To support the development of CUBs, I require as many sets of data as possible. Among them is a group that requires my extra attention, but whose data is fairly inaccessible—the older models of Constructs.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lee', 3: "Older models? From what I know, they've all been decommissioned...", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "Commandant, I assume you also have an inkling of the people who would fit all Asimov's strict criteria—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's right! I'm glad the Gray Ravens didn't antagonize the Forsaken in your previous encounters.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "...You didn't, did you?", 4: '1'}
{2: "I don't think so...", 3: '106', 4: 'I have the right to remain silent.', 5: '111'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "That's alright. We'll stick with the accounts on your reports.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'Very wise of you. As long as you know where you stand.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "I understand, I do. As one of the decision-makers in Babylonia, I wouldn't have sent my best soldier to work with a third party unless it's absolutely necessary—", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '"Unless." Asimov should probably be the one to elaborate.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's simple—let the Forsaken participate in the trial and send their data back. I need as many sets as possible, including but not limited to the two teams we sent earlier and... the others on the surface.", 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: 'As to how you actually get the data...', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Hassen', 3: "The good news is that the Forsaken has agreed to work with us. We're providing them with supplies and a recycling arrangement, both of which they find very agreeable during the winter—or so it seems.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The bad news is that we can only send one person to the surface. On your own, literally, and no Constructs allowed.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'So you already have an arrangement.', 3: '123', 4: 'So it can only be me.', 5: '123'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "That's right. We can only send in one person for the transfer with the Forsaken and handle the data retrieval, and our best candidate is none other than you, 【kuroname】.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "It's nearing the end of the year, so the Forsaken campsite is going to look a little strange. But, they have guaranteed to protect you at all costs.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Lucia', 3: '...Hold on, are you saying that Commandant has to carry out this mission alone?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'The three of you still have to stay and carry out more tests. As to Hassen, you should know the way he does things better than I do.', 4: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 3: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Hassen', 3: "We've arranged for you a specific vehicle and real-time tracking. According to the plan, you'll be transferring the supplies at the outposts along the way.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: 'The correspondence team and the extraction team have already landed. You will be assigned to the supply convoy in the corresponding areas so we can coordinate more easily.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: "Well, that's all for the small talk.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Hassen', 3: '【kuroname】, you have two hours to prepare. See you on the bridge.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryTongxunHalfNew.prefab', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "Alright, the meeting's over. Go get ready, Commandant. Gray Raven, you're staying for more tests.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Lucia', 3: 'Commandant, please stay safe!', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Asimov fixes his messy hair from his earlier nap, looking fidgety due to lack of sleep.'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'And 【kuroname】... Safe travels.', 4: '2'}
